title: Part Three: Mark Zuckerberg: The Worst Person of the 21st Century (So Far)
itunes:title: Part Three: Mark Zuckerberg: The Worst Person of the 21st Century (So Far)
description:
In Part Three, Robert is joined again by Maggie Mae Fish and Jamie Loftus to continue discussing Mark Zuckerberg, Facebook and fake news.
